review: What fun! It is zipline fast, incorporates the apps that are of interest to me (Netflix, PBS, Gaiam TV, etc.), as well as Amazon video. Takes up little space, easy to set up. It's a gem. And, though I thought that anything marketed with Gary Busey's craziness couldn't be functional or worth much, the voice search is fast and accurate. I'm not a channel surfer, and I like being able to find and select what interests me most, quickly. This does it, either by voice (the Amazon library), or via text (for all the apps).
